text.page:
191
102-96a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA bi d+yA a pa rA dzi ta/ bod skad du/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan

192
102-96b thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las rgal/ /rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjid che/ /rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor te/ /thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang / /log dad sel ba'i stobs nyid dang / /gser thub kyi ni bslab pa dang / /'od srung gi ni yon tan dang / /shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /bdag ni rtag tu bde bar shog /tad+ya thA/ dza yan ti/ bi dza yan ti/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dzi ti dzi te/ a pa rA dzi ti/ bar sai n+ya pra mar+d+ha ni ye swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs s+ho//
